trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides access to the column values within each row for a DataReader, and is implemented by .NET Framework data providers that access relational databases.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxx x $xxxxxx$XxxxXxxxxx$$xxxxxx$$ xxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xx .XXX Xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the number of columns in the current row.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

When not positioned in a valid recordset, 0; otherwise, the number of columns in the current record.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ 0$ xxxxxxxxx$ xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The default is -1.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xx $0.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the column located at the specified index.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zero-based index of the column to get.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the column with the specified name.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the column to find.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

No column with the specified name was found.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the value of the specified column as a Boolean.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx x Xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The value of the column.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the 8-bit unsigned integer value of the specified column.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx 0$xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The 8-bit unsigned integer value of the specified column.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx 0$xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads a stream of bytes from the specified column offset into the buffer as an array, starting at the given buffer offset.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index within the field from which to start the read operation.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The buffer into which to read the stream of bytes.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index for buffer to start the read operation.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxx $xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of bytes to read.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The actual number of bytes read.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the character value of the specified column.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The character value of the specified column.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads a stream of characters from the specified column offset into the buffer as an array, starting at the given buffer offset.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index within the row from which to start the read operation.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The buffer into which to read the stream of bytes.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index for buffer to start the read operation.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxx $xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of bytes to read.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The actual number of characters read.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index of the field to find.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the data type information for the specified field.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index of the field to find.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The data type information for the specified field.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the date and time data value of the specified field.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index of the field to find.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The date and time data value of the specified field.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the fixed-position numeric value of the specified field.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxx$xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index of the field to find.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The fixed-position numeric value of the specified field.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx$xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the double-precision floating point number of the specified field.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxx$xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index of the field to find.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The double-precision floating point number of the specified field.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx$xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index of the field to find.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the single-precision floating point number of the specified field.

\n

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index of the field to find.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The single-precision floating point number of the specified field.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx$xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns the GUID value of the specified field.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx XXXX xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index of the field to find.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The GUID value of the specified field.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx XXXX xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the 16-bit signed integer value of the specified field.

\n

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index of the field to find.

The index of the field to find.

\n

The index of the field to find.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Populates an array of objects with the column values of the current record.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Return whether the specified field is set to null.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index of the field to find.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source: true if the specified field is set to null; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xx xxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x
